page.title: 09EDUCATION IN RAMSBOTTOM
page.content: There is one school in the area for children between the ages of 11 and 16.This is our school - Woodhey High School.Children from about 10 primary {schools}come to our school when they are 11 years old.We have to wear a school uniform which is maroon in colour - and we have to wear it tidily.We have 7 lessons a day and homework every night.The{subjects}we study include Mathematics,English, French,Spanish,Geography,History, Art,Drama,Computer Studies,Music and Design to mention but a few.We always start each day with an assembly and have a break at 10.45 p.m.Lunch is from 12.30 p.m.to 1.40 p.m.and we go home at 3.45 p.m.We follow the same time-table every week.We consider a good{education}vital, especially in these days of high national {unemployment.
